name: SplitSnap
description: Take a photo of any receipt or type an expense, instantly see who owes what, and share a link to settle up - no signup required
targetAudience: Roommates aged 22-35 who regularly share groceries, utilities, and household items
valueProposition: Calculate and share expense splits in 10 seconds without anyone creating an account
features: Quick expense entry: Snap a receipt photo or type amount + description
Instant split calculator: Add names, auto-splits evenly or custom percentages
Share via link: Copy a unique URL that shows who owes what - works without app
Running balance: See all unsettled expenses and net amounts owed between people
One-tap feedback: 'Did this save you time?' prompt after settling up
